archimate:Device.name: Patient Engagement Tablets (PETS)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Patient education, interactive patient feedback, telemedicine consultations, outpatient services, community outreach, waiting areas.
Specifications:
• Processor Type: Mid-range ARM-based processor (e.g., Qualcomm Snapdragon 600-series or equivalent) • Memory Capacity: 8 GB RAM • Storage Capacity: 128 GB internal storage • Display Size and Resolution: 10–11 inches, Full HD (1920x1080), bright, high-contrast touchscreen • Battery Life: Minimum 8–10 hours per charge • Operating System: Windows 11 pro • Connectivity Options: Wi-Fi (dual-band), Bluetooth 5.0, cellular LTE • Weight and Dimensions: Lightweight (< 1.5 lbs), approx. 10"x7"x0.4" • Input Options: Touchscreen (multi-touch), patient-friendly stylus • Camera Specifications: Front-facing camera minimum 5 MP (for video conferencing or virtual consultations), rear camera • Accessories: Keyboard and mouse • Protective Equipment: Robust protective case, tempered glass screen protector, easy-clean surfaces. Cases must have a kick stand. Wall mounts must be added.
